name: GRAPHIX CYCLING JERSEY ORANGE
description:
Available in Mens and Womens- make your gender selection in the size drop down menu.

"Designed by MettleVelo"

Graphix Cycling Jersey

Let's get real: Jersey graphics can get a little ridiculous. You want something rad but you don't want to look like a cycling billboard. That's why we're digging the Graphix Cycling Jersey. The masterly design gives you something different to hit the streets with, but the subtle graphics keep everything respectable. The end game? This jersey does something that few others can do...it makes you stand out without being shown up.

The Deets: 
-Item # SM1017/SF2017 
-Artist Designed by Mettle Velo
-100% polyester 
-Coolmax 
-Sublimated graphics 
-Half-zip invisible zipper 
-3 rear pockets 
-Product will ship in 1-2 days

Sizing, short sleeve Mens cycling jersey: 
Men, chest in inches 
XS – 34-37 
S – 37-38 
M – 38-40 
L – 40-41 
XL – 41-43 
2XL – 43-45

Womens jersey now offers a more sleek cut: if you're looking for a more relaxed fit, size up!

Sizing, short sleeve womens cycling jersey: 
chest in inches 
XS – 32-35 
S – 35-37 
M – 37-38 
L – 38-40 
XL – 40-41 
2XL – 41-43

name: ARTIST DESIGNED CYCLING JERSEY BY METTLE VELO
description:
Limited availability.  

About:
Scott Shore describes MettleVelo:  "MettleVelo was born out of a love for great design and an almost obsessive desire for all things bike. I ride a lot, race a little and think about bikes and bike culture far too often. I also make pretty pictures for pay. The two had to run in to each other at some point - and out came MettleVelo: Custom Bike Culture Design."

Regarding the design, Scott says, "Gangster pin stripes under organic wings, wheel and flourishes creates a juxtaposition that makes you want to put this bad boy on and hit the road, trail or next century."

The Deets: 
-Item # SM1010/SF2010
-Artist Designed by Scott Shore of MettleVelo 
-100% polyester 
-Coolmax 
-Sublimated graphics 
-3/4 length invisible zipper 
-3 rear pockets 
-Product will ship in 1-2 days

Sizing, short sleeve cycling jersey: 
Men, chest in inches 
XS – 34-37 
S – 37-38 
M – 38-40 
L – 40-41 
XL – 41-43 
2XL – 43-45

Women, chest in inches 
XS – 32-35 
S – 35-37 
M – 37-38 
L – 38-40 
XL – 40-41 
2XL – 41-43

name: ARTIST DESIGNED CYCLING JERSEY BY KELLY MUNSON
description:
Kelly states for her Groucho Sports design, "I have quite a few cycling jerseys and the ones I like the best are the all-over patterns. They don't show dirt and they are striking from a distance. For my concept, I was inspired by the idea of Scottish Clans; which is kinda how it feels to be a biker, part of a prideful community...a family, really. So I created a "plaid" made out of bike chains. Part punk rock/part braveheart. In girls and boys colors." 

The Deets:
-Item # SM1009
-Artist Designed by Kelly Munson
-100% polyester
-Coolmax  
-Sublimated graphics
-Half-zip invisible zipper
-3 rear pockets
-Product will ship in 1-2 days

Sizing, short sleeve cycling jersey:
Men, chest in inches
XS – 34-37 
S – 37-38 
M – 38-40 
L – 40-41 
XL – 41-43 
2XL – 43-45
